# libraries used
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

# Load data
The data has been processed and and a dataframe built of the month results
```{r}
load(file = "./data/FPA.RData")
str(FPA)
head(FPA)
```

## add 
```{r}
FPA$date <- as.Date(paste("1",
                          as.character(FPA$Month),
                          as.character(FPA$Year)), 
                    format = "%d %b %Y")
```

# data overview
```{r}
summary(FPA)
```
